content:
I’m a data analyst and social scientist driven by intellectual curiosity to deliver evidence-based insights that enable organisations to improve their outcomes. With subject expertise in political science and leadership experience in higher education, I bring a keen eye for research design as well as the ability to cultivate effective cross-functional teams and communicate complex ideas to diverse audiences.
To learn more about my background and work, please check out my bio, CV, and project portfolio below. If you think I can create value for your organisation, send me an email to schedule a chat.
summary: I’m a data analyst and social scientist driven by intellectual curiosity to deliver evidence-based insights that enable organisations to improve their outcomes. With subject expertise in political science and leadership experience in higher education, I bring a keen eye for research design as well as the ability to cultivate effective cross-functional teams and communicate complex ideas to diverse audiences.
title: Chris Buck

summary: Using machine learning tools such as regressions, decision trees, k-means clustering, and natural language processing, I enabled an online games retailer to predict customer behaviour regarding loyalty points accumulation and product review sentiment.
title: Predictive Analytics to Optimise a Loyalty Rewards Programme

summary: Using the matplotlib, numpy, pandas, and seaborn libraries in Python, I diagnosed the factors that contribute to missed GP appointments for NHS England.
title: Diagnostic Analytics to Address Missed GP Appointments for NHS England

summary: Using advanced Excel functions, SQL queries, and Tableau dashboards for exploratory data analysis, I generated business intelligence for a global supermarket's targeted advertising campaign.
title: Descriptive Analytics for a Targeted Advertising Campaign

summary: Using the Beautiful Soup package, I put together a Python script that scrapes exchange rates from HMRC webpages and exports them to a csv file.
title: Scraping Exchange Rates from HMRC Webpages
